author: garyrong
content:
Hey guys, I am Gary from Geth team. Recently I made a writeup illustrating the issues related to contract redeployment. The expected behavior is not clearly defined in some corner cases. 

Therefore I will ask you guys to check this writeup and hopefully we can reach the consensus and spec it clearly where things are unclear.

https://gist.github.com/rjl493456442/b8dbe56491c74c532cb2f0bab4b5292d

<@&836981603216654336> <@&652918665943056397> <@&688101493978562687> <@&1070471163219824730> <@892053833121923094><@243183686562873344>
